clean_data: Web Designer Web Designer Web DesignerWordPress Site Developer Lynndyl UT Ive been working in the design industry doing both web and print since 2009 In that time Ive been involved in a variety of design projects including corporate branding website redesigns PPC ads social media images magazine ads popup banners vehicle wraps and many more I work well alone or with a team and am known for my speed and quality of work I love learning new skills both professionally and personally and will wear multiple hats when called upon to implement those skills for the use of my employer Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Web Designer 4Life Sandy UT March 2016 to Present In my role as a web designer for 4Life I am responsible for updating the design of pages on the corporate website based on user feedback analytics and supervisor direction Some of which include pages in the signup process account management reports and product sales pages I am the principle designer of our corporate sites home page banners as well as dashboard ads for loggedin users Additionally I support the social media team on occasion by designing images to post to Facebook Instagram and other platforms I acted as the primary designer of a 4Life app for our distributors The design of the app has been praised throughout all levels of the company I also designed a mediasharing app that received many compliments but ultimately was not developed due to time constraints of the dev team 4Life has encouraged me to incorporate my interest in photography into my work by allowing me the opportunity to shoot product photography for our website designs WebPrint Designer Front End Web Developer Five Star Franchising ProNexis Spanish Fork UT March 2012 to March 2016 I currently wear several hats at Five Star 1 Website designer I design all of the websites landing pages PPC ads etc for all of our franchisees under multiple brands I am also in charge of the design of multiple newsletters and consumer emails we send at least monthly some weekly 2 Front end developer I develop all of the designs I create into fully functional WordPress sites 3 Website administrator I purchase and manage the renewal and sometimes deletion all of the domain names for the company 4 Print designer I handle franchisee requests for print collateral ranging from business cards to vehicle wraps magazine ads mailers door stickers etc HTMLCSS Coder Infogenix Orem UT November 2011 to March 2012 Slice and code Photoshop web designs into working HTMLCSS pages Then code those pages
